name: Brooks Adrenaline GTS 24 Supportive Running Shoe
description: A high-performance running shoe engineered for stability, cushioning, and support for a smooth, comfortable run.
longDescription: The Brooks Adrenaline Alloy Fusion Medium is designed for runners seeking a balanced blend of cushioning, stability, and durability. Featuring responsive cushioning that absorbs impact and a secure, adaptive fit, these shoes help enhance your running performance on various terrains. The engineered outsole provides reliable traction and long-lasting durability, while the modern design ensures both style and performance. Whether you're training for long distances or enjoying a daily jog, these shoes deliver consistent support and comfort.

features.title: Responsive Cushioning
features.description: Advanced cushioning technology absorbs impact and ensures a smooth ride.

features.title: Stability & Support
features.description: Engineered for enhanced stability and support during your runs.

features.title: Durable Outsole
features.description: Provides excellent traction and long-lasting durability on various surfaces.

features.title: Adaptive Fit
features.description: Secure, adaptive fit that conforms to your foot for maximum comfort.

pros: Many color options including full black
cons: Higher price point may not suit all budgets
